notes: Cycle-accurate SNES emulator; 100% compatibility; HD Mode 7 support in bsnes-hd variant; multiple RetroArch cores (bsnes/bsnes-hd)
High-accuracy emulator; 99.5% compatibility; excellent performance; multiple RetroArch core versions (snes9x/snes9x_2010)
Cycle-accurate multi-system emulator; 99.94% SNES compatibility; save path configurable in Settings > Paths; no RetroArch core
Cycle-accurate multi-system emulator; RetroArch core is Mesen-S; Flatpak is unofficial community build
